name: HexaQon
description:
HexaQon is game where you can relax... or not.  

Make your way to the end and win something really yummy :P

Controls:

  • Move: A & D / Arrow Keys
  • Pause: Esc

DISCLAIMER:  THIS GAME IS IN DEVELOPMENT!

Game is free to play, but you can donate if you want to support me and my coming projects.

I am 16 years old starter programmer and this is my first game ever, so there might be some bugs. Tell me if you find some.
